content.en: Transport Resilience: Algorithms are being used to evaluate, analyze, and optimize the resilience and friability of transportation networks. They are also being used to optimize resource allocation in vulnerable transportation networks, quantify capacity uncertainty and assess resilience in urban road networks, and prioritize the restoration of multiple facility, multiple-hazard road networks. Additionally, algorithms are being used to assess and optimize the resilience of urban rail transit networks, plan transportation network recovery based on resilience, and quantify and optimize the resilience of transit infrastructure under systemic risks.
content.da: Transportresiliens: Algoritmer bruges til at evaluere, analysere og optimere robustheden og skrøbeligheden af transportnetværk. De bruges også til at optimere ressourceallokering i sårbare transportnetværk, kvantificere kapacitetsusikkerhed og vurdere robusthed i urbane vejnet, samt prioritere restaurering af flerfacilitets-, flerfarer-vejnetværk. Derudover bruges algoritmer til at vurdere og optimere robustheden af urbane jernbanetransitnetværk, planlægge genopretning af transportnetværk baseret på robusthed, samt kvantificere og optimere robustheden af transitinfrastruktur under systemiske risici.
